transcript.text: So, you have grown 10 pounds?
Hum? The "foie gras" ,the smoked salmon, all of this..
Guys, today i make this little video to make a small summary of 2016
and talk about many things.
According to me, 2016 has been a wonderful and busy year
with videos, we had really great times together this year

and I really think that it is the year 
 I released the coolest videos
or at least that I personally like the most and of which I am proud of.
Because of course there are videos which are just good
and when you release it you think "yeah ok, this is not this great"
and then there are other videos which makes you really happy to release
And this year I'm really convinced and happy of the final result of the majority of my videos
and all of this is because I don't work alone anymore
I'm working with Clément that you already know
and who films me in the HTC VIVE videos etc..
It allows me to not be alone, to not isolate myself from the world
and to live things, to apreciate more my job today witch is being a youtuber.
That's a job ! That's a job !
Furthermore now I have this new studio
which is not where I live and fuck it feels so good !
A lot of you did not understand
why is it this good for me to have a new studio
they would rather think  "That's gross, you're more into professionalism, that sucks, it was better in your bedroom, you have changed..."
No, not at all, it's all the contrary
in fact, now I am not at home anymore, I am no more between the same four walls
from 10 A.M. to midnight.
Because yeah, I was in my office when I played for fun, when I shot videos and when I edited videos
when I was drinking a cofee too ! That was horrible !
And now I go to work like everyone, on the morning I leave my house, I'm in the traffic jam, I rage
And I go to this fucking office in which I feel so much better
because it's not where I live and when I am here I know why I am here and what to do.
It was a relief to me
Even in the videos I think you can see it
I have an infinite pleasure compared to
before, when i started to get smoked like the salmon
you ate a few days ago
That allowed me to get ressourced and to enjoy a lot more what I've been doing
So that is just perfect and
did you point the fact that my videos are less childish ?
no ?
It's been nearly 6 years since the first video. Can you imagine guys, 6 years ?
at the time we were very young, we did not have beards,
we had shrill voices
mine is still shrill but it's not wanted
and we have changed together and I can see a lot of people who didn't watch the videos for like 3 or 4 years
and now, these people enjoy it
and there is also a thing that says it's a shame to like Squeezie's videos in 2016
but things change, the content changes too
and we do too
and this doesn't surprise me
it's more mature and less... [Typical Squeezie song]
we make videos more chill and more considered
with psychologic purposes like in some videos we did this year
and it seemed like you really liked it guys so I'm very glad about it
some people told me that they hated my videos but now they like it because they have changed, they think it's more "relax" and less childish
but it doesn't mean I want to make serious videos only
but we are more mature in our bullshit than before
I really am who I want to be, sometimes I'm more serious in some videos than in others,
and I think my videos' content never fit me so well
I'm not gonna lie, this end of the year had been overloaded
because of the Last Guardian
it was not something to endure, no I really enjoyed it
but that was an other workload, plus time to add
that was really cool but
that was added to the workload I make every day
so I had to make 6 videos in addition of the 4 usual videos of the week
so I had to work a lot more
and I was afraid to be demotivated by the fact
of doubling the workload
and not being followed by people
For "The Last Guardian" I was not expecting such a success,
people loved it on my YouTube Channel
I'm still amazed that so much people liked  this adventure
who followed it
because it's slow ...sometimes we dont find the solution in the game
Anyway, I cut these passages when I edit the video
but it still very calm and slow
it's a very particular atmosphere
who has nothing in common with what we do usually
And, yeah, you mostly loved it
All the episodes has made at least one million views
I was really surprised
And then I told myself : "Fuck yeah, It really worthed it to double my workload"
Because people have followed this Let's Play
So, I thank you a lot, I know that you miss Trico now
You would like Sony to release "The Last Guardian 2" tomorrow
And me too !! If they could release it this afternoon it works for me !
In fact, I think that was the better way to conclude the year
Specificially making more videos
In a completely different mood
Even if it works lesser
And in the end, it has not less worked than the other things
Because you had completely adhered
And then ... Thank you !
In effect, the end of the year has been very very very busy
I take some little vacations
Yeah, yeah, yeah the RTT (Reduction du Temps de Travail = Shorter Working Time)
You know it !
My friends !
Tomorrow !
I'll go ...
In Korea !
South Korea !
[Whoooooooooo !!]
I had been in March for 5 days
Before going to Japan
Where I had done you a lot of Vlog
And by the way, I did not do a lot of things there
And this is my biggest regret
I tell myself "Crap, I went 5 days in South Korea"
And when I am told "What did you do there?"
[Euuuuuuuuh]
"s... shops =_="
I'm an asshole
And I'd really like to never have this answer again
So I decided to return one week
A small week, finally 8 days to be exact
I'm leaving tomorrow early in the afternoon
So I made some videos in advance,but not too many
Indeed,I'm leaving tomorrow and I'm coming back the 5th of november....
January ! November..?!
I'm coming back on the 5th of january,so the next thursday
and there'll be videos this week,no problems
But the next week,so the first week of january,there will be some
Maybe one or two vlogs of Korea because I really want you to discover  things
I have a program...really too handsome there
I've made a little program for myself,it'll be crazy...
You'll like it
I really want to show you what I'm going to do there
But,fo the first week of january
Here, I have nothing planned in terms of videos in advance
Because, already making 3 advances it required me a lot of work
And if I did more, the content of the videos would be a little naught
These are videos that I'm going to be a little less proud of,  because I've been prone to do them
I found ideas like * clipotis clipotas * quickly
And I know I won't be happy to put this online, it will make me shit
So I prefer not to put anything online,
And propose you the vlog of korea
And I'm sure you will like it!
I would therefore return on January 5th so on Thursday
And on the 6th and 7th of January: I have a shoot
For a video that will come at the end of January on my Channel
So the come back of Korea is going to be a bit rude

Because it's going to be a shoot ...
Over 48 hours we will work 38 hours minus i'm sure !
But damn, it's gonna be worth it!
In addition, there are full of buddies youtubeurs who work on the project
I can't wait to show you!
Finally, all this to tell you that 2016 on youtube
In the past 5 years, it has been the best
I mean, these are the videos I'm most proud of
I made the videos I wanted to do
I did not force myself to do things, I was the most myself i think
In addition I had this new studio
It was a new way of working with Clément
And that made me happy, It was the cool wind that I needed
And I think you've noticed it in my videos
Because, as I said, even people who no longer watched my videos
And who have looked at them by chance, they say
"Fuck, it is actually good now"
And for me, this behavior there
People who come back years later and enjoy my videos
It's a victory
Damn, it's cool it proves I'm changing
That I grow, that I mature, that I propose different contents
Who likes, and who sometimes do not like the others
Because it can no longer like also
But whether it pleases or not, it marks evolution and I think it is important to evolve.
In what I do, and not too stagnate and stay on its gains
The 1000th video for example, we did not stay on our achievements
Thank you for everything, I hope that 2017 will be even better
I don't know how we're going to be able to, because I've never been so happy
We will find a way, don't worry about it
At worst, small smoked salmon, I'm flourished
So I wish you a good second week of holidays
A good new year
Enjoy your gifts, your family, a new pc gamer for some people maybe or your game station
Thank you for everything, thank you for this year, I am going to Korea to finish the year
Then I will come back in good shape to offer you even better videos I hope!
I hope the videos I made in advance for this week will please you
And we meet next week for vlog in Korea
Take card, goodbye everyone, good end of year ...
PEACE
Thanks for 2016
